template.p: Welcome to your new Odoo Marketing Agency package! This guide will help you navigate the key features and get your agency operations running efficiently.
Your Odoo for Marketing Agencies package includes the essential apps to manage your client relationships, projects, and agency operations:

ul.li: CRM App: Track leads and opportunities, manage your sales pipeline, and never miss a potential client.
Sales App: Create professional proposals and manage your service offerings.
Subscriptions App: Set up recurring revenue streams for retainer clients.
Project App: Plan and track all your client projects with task management and milestones.
Timesheets App: Track time spent on client work for accurate billing and resource planning.
Planning App: Schedule your team's workload and manage resource allocation.
Website App: Showcase your agency's portfolio and services to attract new clients.
Social Marketing App: Manage social media campaigns for your clients from one dashboard.
Invoicing App: Bill clients professionally and track payments.
Events App: Organise client workshops, training sessions, and marketing events.

div.div: If you want to test & explore this industry package, you can try to execute this flow:

ol.li: Go to the website, and post a contact form for a new opportunity.
Navigate to the corresponding opportunity in your CRM
From there, create a quotation for this customer and select the "Website" quotation template.
Use the Quote Calculator to select the features you want to include in this website.
Confirm this Quotation and navigate to the created project.
Play with tasks, try to log time and to communicate with your colleagues.
Plan you project in the planning App.

div.p: Integrate Everything: Link your CRM opportunities to projects, timesheets to invoices, and subscriptions to recurring services for a seamless workflow.
Use Task Templates: Create standardized tasks for repetitive work like monthly reporting, content reviews, or campaign launches to ensure consistency.
Track Profitability: Monitor project profitability by comparing estimated hours to actual time spent using the Timesheets and Project apps.
Create Service Packages: Bundle services into packages (like "Brand Launch" or "Digital Presence") to streamline your sales process and upsell clients.
Automate Reporting: Schedule automated reports for clients showing campaign performance, hours worked, and project progress.
Leverage Subscriptions: Convert project clients to retainer relationships using the Subscriptions app for predictable revenue.
